scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:types
scripts.local:test: npm run db:up && npm run test:all && npm run db:down
scripts.local:coverage: npm run db:up && npm run test:coverage && npm run db:down
scripts.test:mysql8: npm run lint && cross-env DB=mysql8 jest --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:postgres15: npm run lint && cross-env DB=postgres15 jest --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:sqlite3: npm run lint && cross-env DB=sqlite3 jest --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:mssql22: npm run lint && cross-env DB=mssql22 jest --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:mysql8:coverage: npm run lint && cross-env DB=mysql8 jest --config test/jest.config.js --coverage
scripts.test:sqlite3:coverage: npm run lint && cross-env DB=sqlite3 jest --config test/jest.config.js --coverage
scripts.test:postgres15:coverage: npm run lint && cross-env DB=postgres15 jest --config test/jest.config.js --coverage
scripts.test:mssql22:coverage: npm run lint && cross-env DB=mssql22 jest --config test/jest.config.js --coverage
scripts.db:up: sqlite3 .sqlite3.db < src/__tests__/data/sqlite.sql && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up --build -d mysql8 postgres15 mssql22 && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up waitmysql8 postgres15 waitmssql22
